Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Enums
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Enums 
    Enum and Description
    com.here.mobility.sdk.core.auth.UserAuthenticationException.Code
    use instanceof to determine the specific error.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.here.mobility.sdk.demand.PassengerDetails.builder()
    please use the builder that gets the mandatory properties.
    com.here.mobility.sdk.demand.CreateRideRequest.builder(String, PassengerDetails)
    please use the builder with TaxiRideOffer instead
    com.here.mobility.sdk.demand.DemandClient.cancelRide(String, String)
    This field is deprecated, please use DemandClient.cancelRide(CancelRideRequest) instead. This request can throw the following exceptions: HMAuthException
    com.here.mobility.sdk.demand.RidePreferences.create(boolean)
    Use RidePreferences.Builder instead.
    com.here.mobility.sdk.demand.Ride.getConfirmedPickupPoint()
    This field is deprecated, please use getRoute().getPickup().getLocation() instead
    com.here.mobility.sdk.core.auth.UserAuthenticationException.getErrorCode()
    use instanceof to determine the specific error.
    com.here.mobility.sdk.demand.RideLocation.getEstimatedDropOffTime()
    This field is deprecated, please use RideLocation.getEstimatedDropOffTimeSeconds() instead to avoid timezone differences issues.
    com.here.mobility.sdk.demand.RideOfferBase.getEstimatedDropOffTime()
    This field is deprecated, please use RideOfferBase.getEstimatedRideDurationSeconds() instead to avoid timezone differences issues.
    com.here.mobility.sdk.demand.RideOfferBase.getEstimatedDurationMs()
    This field is deprecated, please use RideOfferBase.getEstimatedRideDurationSeconds() instead to avoid timezone differences issues.
    com.here.mobility.sdk.demand.RideLocation.getEstimatedPickupTime()
    This field is deprecated, please use RideLocation.getEstimatedPickupTimeSeconds() instead to avoid timezone differences issues.
    com.here.mobility.sdk.demand.RideOfferBase.getEstimatedPickupTime()
    This field is deprecated, please use RideOfferBase.getEstimatedPickupTimeSeconds() instead to avoid timezone differences issues.
    com.here.mobility.sdk.core.net.ResponseException.getRootCause()
    This always return this, Check the exception's type instead.
    com.here.mobility.sdk.map.geocoding.GeocodingClient.newInstance(Context)
    Use GeocodingClient.newInstance() instead.
    com.here.mobility.sdk.map.route.RoutingClient.newInstance(Context)
    Use RoutingClient.newInstance() instead.
    com.here.mobility.sdk.demand.DemandClient.newInstance(Context)
    Use DemandClient.newInstance() instead.
    com.here.mobility.sdk.demand.PassengerDetails.Builder.setName(String)
    please use the builder that gets the mandatory name.
    com.here.mobility.sdk.demand.PassengerDetails.Builder.setPhoneNumber(String)
    please use the builder that gets the mandatory phone number.
